hero.description: Your partners in crafting unforgettable digital experiences that captivate, engage, and inspire. With a passion for innovation and a commitment to excellence, we specialize in creating immersive digital solutions that leave a lasting impact and help you achieve your goals.

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use essential cookies to make this site work, and optional cookies to improve your experience. You can choose to accept only essential cookies or allow all.
cookies.note: Your choice will be stored in the cookie

cookiesPage.title: Cookies & Privacy
cookiesPage.intro: This page explains which cookies we use on this website and what they are for.

whatWeStore.title: What cookies we set
whatWeStore.description: We only use a small number of cookies to make the website work and to remember your preferences.

items.consent: Stores your cookie consent choice (for example, essential only or all cookies).
items.locale: Stores your preferred language (for example, English or Italian) so we can redirect you to the right version of the site.
items.prefs: Stores lightweight interface preferences, such as view mode or whether you have dismissed certain messages.

retention.title: How long we keep cookies
retention.description: We typically keep these cookies for 6–12 months. You can clear them at any time from your browser settings.

noTracking.title: No authentication or tracking IDs
noTracking.description: We do not store authentication data, user accounts, or personal tracking IDs in cookies on this site.

analytics.title: Analytics and third-party tools
analytics.description: If we add analytics in the future (for example, Google Analytics or Meta Pixel), they will only run when your cookie consent is set to more than "essential".

manage.title: Managing your choices
manage.description: You can change your cookie preferences at any time using the cookie banner or the Cookies & Privacy link in the footer. You can also clear all cookies via your browser settings.
manage.success: Your cookie preferences have been updated.
